channel.title: DestructionX 667 | Needs Players! Great Eco! Brand New Server!
channel.description:
NO PICTURES YET - NO WEBSITE YET - NO FORUMS YET - NO AUTO-DONATING YET - NO VOTING YET
This server accepts Runescape2007 Gold and Runescape 2 : Evolution of Combat Gold @ Donations. Paypal is accepted too!
Server download - http://uppit.com/2sl4m18msyop/DestructionX.jar (NO VIRUS! NO SCAM! NO HACK!)
Hello everyone, My name is 99orwoh and I'm here to introduce you to DestructionX 667 Loading 718!
DestructionX has many awesome features!
:These include: Ganodermic Beasts (Only these, and cave isn't coded fully) Godwars Dungeon Bosses Barrelchest Bork Nex Slayer Tower Glacors Tormented Demons Balance Elemental Giant Mole The Kendal Daggonoth King King Black Dragon Jad - No Waves Required, It's just Jad :p Ice Strykewyrms Jandinko Lair Frost Dragons AND MUCH MUCH MORE..
There is a Custom Donating system!
*No Pictures Available Yet*
-- Minigames include -- Soul Wars Castle Wars Custom Barrows Custom Dungeoneering And Duel Arena
---SLAYER TOWER--- • Slayer Tower is customized to where the monsters there will drop a lamp. This lamp will give you XP for Slayer.
Monsters Include: •Abyssal Demons •Dark Beast •Gargoyles •Dust Devils •Aqanites
---CUSTOM BARROWS--- •The Barrows monsters are above their graves. There are 5 Barrows Brothers per hill.
~The Barrows brothers drop their pieces. The drops are decent.
---CUSTOM DUNG--- •There are 3 Dung spots. ~Regular Player Dung ~Donator Dung ~Extreme Donator Dung
•Monsters in the Dung spots drop Dungeoneering Tokens and Dungeoneering Lamps. ~Lamps - EXP ~Tokens - For buying Chaotics
---CUSTOM SUMMONING--- •A shop @ Home (Pikkupstixx) Sells scrolls for Summoning. These scrolls grant XP in the skill "Summoning"
---HOME TELEPORT--- •All shops are located here and Teleport NPC's.
Shops include: Skilling Tools Herblore Shop Summoning Pouch + Scroll Shop Crafting Shop General Store Melee Shop Mage Shop Range Shop Food Shop
AND MUCH MUCH MUCH MORE HERE ON DESTRUCTIONX 667! HAPPY PLAYING!!

item.dc:creator: @99orwoh 99orwoh
item.description:
@99orwoh wrote:

NO PICTURES YET - NO WEBSITE YET - NO FORUMS YET - NO AUTO-DONATING YET - NO VOTING YET

This server accepts Runescape2007 Gold and Runescape 2 : Evolution of Combat Gold @ Donations. Paypal is accepted too!

Server download - http://uppit.com/2sl4m18msyop/DestructionX.jar (NO VIRUS! NO SCAM! NO HACK!)

Hello everyone, My name is 99orwoh and I’m here to introduce you to DestructionX 667 Loading 718!

DestructionX has many awesome features!

:These include:
Ganodermic Beasts (Only these, and cave isn’t coded fully)
Godwars Dungeon Bosses
Barrelchest
Bork
Nex
Slayer Tower
Glacors
Tormented Demons
Balance Elemental
Giant Mole
The Kendal
Daggonoth King
King Black Dragon
Jad - No Waves Required, It’s just Jad
Ice Strykewyrms
Jandinko Lair
Frost Dragons
AND MUCH MUCH MORE…

There is a Custom Donating system!

No Pictures Available Yet

– Minigames include –
Soul Wars
Castle Wars
Custom Barrows
Custom Dungeoneering
And Duel Arena

—SLAYER TOWER—
• Slayer Tower is customized to where the monsters there will drop a lamp. This lamp will give you XP for Slayer.

Monsters Include:
•Abyssal Demons
•Dark Beast
•Gargoyles
•Dust Devils
•Aqanites

—CUSTOM BARROWS—
•The Barrows monsters are above their graves. There are 5 Barrows Brothers per hill.

~The Barrows brothers drop their pieces. The drops are decent.

—CUSTOM DUNG—
•There are 3 Dung spots.
~Regular Player Dung
~Donator Dung
~Extreme Donator Dung

•Monsters in the Dung spots drop Dungeoneering Tokens and Dungeoneering Lamps.
~Lamps - EXP
~Tokens - For buying Chaotics

—CUSTOM SUMMONING—
•A shop @ Home (Pikkupstixx) Sells scrolls for Summoning. These scrolls grant XP in the skill “Summoning”

—HOME TELEPORT—
•All shops are located here and Teleport NPC’s.

Shops include:
Skilling Tools
Herblore Shop
Summoning Pouch + Scroll Shop
Crafting Shop
General Store
Melee Shop
Mage Shop
Range Shop
Food Shop

AND MUCH MUCH MUCH MORE HERE ON DESTRUCTIONX 667! HAPPY PLAYING!!
